entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Saint John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:19 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 08:10 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: NNE 24 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to freezing rain mixed with rain near noon and ending this afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of ice pellets beginning in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
